name: Lizard! Unleashed (Demo)
description:
Lizard! Unleashed is a 3D platformer where you play as a lizard and grapple objects with your tongue to navigate your owner's apartment. This is a demo which has taken players from 10 minutes to 2 hours to complete (as far as we're aware), and we're working on a full release.

Features

  • Grapple and jump puzzles, with gliding and wall climb also unlockable!
  • Three upgrades plus one final challenge to grapple to
  • Collectible crickets if the above isn't enough
  • Between 10 minutes and 2 hours of gameplay depending on how many years of grappling you have on your resume

Controls

  • WASD for movement, move mouse to look around
  • C to toggle first/third person modes
  • Left-click and hold mouse to grapple; let go to release grapple
  • Q to toggle highlight of grapple-able (red) or wall climbable (blue) objects
  • Escape to open pause menu (includes settings and objectives and hints)
  • R to auto-kill and respawn at most progressed heat lamp
  • Hold space while in the air for glider (needs to be unlocked first!)
  • Press space near wall to enter/exit wall climb (needs to be unlocked first!)

General post-demo things we plan to do

  • Make more levels with more grapple puzzles and exploration
  • Polish core mechanics
  • Change the art style (we will replace the current environment fully)
